with Epstein-Barr, chronic fatigue,

everyone was like, "Okay, is he doing enough?"

I've got goosebumps now, you know.

Without a doubt.
How can I do everything?
Train harder. Not eat.
Be on my own in bootcamp mode.
It'd just be so bad.
He was quite desperate, I think, by that point.

translation.en: He was quite short with me because I didn't understand.

How? How? How has it happened?
[Peta] We argued about nothing.

lost in the middle of everything that was going on.
[Mark] Like, I was a nightmare to live with, but…

translation.en: Peta could have eased that stuff, do you know what I mean?

[Peta] He was…
not really him at that particular moment.

What the fuck was wrong with me?

He was suffering.

I had psychological assessments.
I had neurological tests. Reaction tests.
Blood tests.
[Dr. Helge] The blood results showed that there was an active infection in his body.
We call it Epstein-Barr virus.
So, for Mark, it's a disaster.
It was still there.
He said, "You shouldn't have been racing."
"You should have stopped there immediately."
If you continue to race with Epstein-Barr or any other infection,
translation.de: Man fährt nicht mit einer Infektion,

[Dr. Helge] Close to the situation where I would say,

any sort of mental health disorder.
It was difficult because…
Mark had not really been anybody

Mark was very much like,

"Like, try and hold on because he is there still,
underneath, kind of, this."
"You just have to try and hold on."
"He doesn't mean a lot of the things that he's saying."

translation.en: "I know that doesn't make it any easier for you."

we just have to hope that when we come through the other side of this,

translation.de: die Person ist, die du wiedererkennst."

and some people advised me to say,

Do we really keep him? Do we not keep him?

translation.de: Das Teammanagement dachte: "Der Fahrer hatte eine tolle Karriere,

Is he taking the piss?
At the start of the season, he's underperforming

"He's handshaking people and saying he's finished."

translation.en: "Last time you'll see him."
If you always try to live in this world of glory and fame
translation.de: Wenn man immer Ruhm geerntet hat

translation.en: and being untouchable, and, uh…
on top of the game,
I think that really makes things super difficult on the human level.

translation.en: You know, falling back to the place where the family is.

I didn't know this version of him at all.

translation.de: Ich schlief aber im selben Bett,

translation.en: I was cooking for him, cleaning for him,
translation.de: ich kochte und putzte für ihn,

translation.en: trying to make sure he was okay. Trying to fix him.
translation.de: ich kümmerte mich und versuchte, ihm zu helfen.

translation.en: It would be like, "Well, if you hadn't have let me be on my own all that time,

And then the house was just too loud, so he couldn't be in the house.

translation.en: We'd have to not stay in the house.
I didn't have anything, didn't want anything, didn't…
do anything, didn't feel anything.
Just…
You're just fucking empty, like, you know.
The sense of worthlessness.
And I was scared that I was going to go past my limit
translation.de: Ich hatte Angst, ich übernehme mich

translation.en: and not be able to come back again.
I would then ring Helge and be like,

translation.en: [Rolf] And everyone realized that something was really, really bad with him.

translation.en: I'd lost any get up that I'd ever had.
Just to be a person, to be a dad.

translation.en: To be a friend, a husband, like…
[Dr. Helge] I think there's a high risk that you harm yourself,
translation.de: Das Risiko ist hoch, dass man sich etwas antut,

translation.en: or even that you commit suicide.
[Dr. Helge] Mark and I made a deal.
I said, "Before you do something to yourself…
call me."
Walking through the small Isle of Man airport,
translation.de: Ich lief durch den winzigen Flugplatz der Isle of Man

and there was this lovely, lovely lady who said, "Are you David?"
translation.de: Eine bezaubernde Dame fragte: "Sind Sie David?"

And I actually said, "Where's Mark?"
I'd never really been a fan of sports psychologists.

translation.en: I always feel judged by a psychologist.
Should I not cross my arms in front of you?
What do you do with your hands?

[David] I get to the front door,

translation.de: Ja, Cav schied gerade seinen Mageninhalt wieder aus,

translation.en: because he'd… slightly hungover. [chuckles]
More than slightly.
I thought it was a waste of time doing it.
It's like, "Okay, what have I actually walked into here?"
translation.de: So: "Was tue ich mir da nur an?"

translation.en: I just thought,
"Doesn't work for me," you know?
I was making sure that the situation wasn't acute enough
translation.de: Ich sah erstmal, ob die Situation nicht so akut war,

translation.en: to have to call someone to put him in the hospital.
translation.de: dass er in die Klinik musste.

translation.en: Because you were worried he was going to harm himself?
translation.de: Hatten Sie Angst, er tut sich was an?

translation.en: Yeah, yeah.
So, yeah.
Peta, she was extremely concerned for her husband.
translation.de: Peta macht sich große Sorgen um ihren Mann.

translation.en: "Is my life worth it anymore?" "This is not worth it."

translation.en: [interviewer] Did you have any comprehension of how worried Peta, Rolf,
translation.de: Hattest du eine Vorstellung, wie besorgt Peta, Rolf

translation.en: everybody was about you?
No, not at all.
No.
I was too consumed in self-pity to care about what anyone…
translation.de: Ich war zu gefangen im Selbstmitleid, um die Sorge anderer um mich

translation.en: cared about me.
[David] Needed some time with friends.
They just knew Cav as Cav.
Didn't care where the performance was. It was just him.
translation.de: Egal, was er leistete, es war trotzdem er.

translation.en: And, uh, yeah, love him for him.
translation.de: Sie lieben ihn, wie er ist.

translation.en: [Peter Kennaugh] I've known Cav pretty much my whole life.
translation.de: Ich kenne Cav mein ganzes Leben.

translation.en: He used to come round my house in Onchan and babysit me for the day.
translation.de: Er kam zu uns nach Onchan und passte auf mich auf. EHEMALIGER RADRENNPROFI

translation.en: And he'd take me to the park.
And we'd all go off on our bikes.
[chuckles] Pete's loose as fuck, like…
And…
a good guy, like, I love him.
I've loved him since he was a kid.
translation.de: Ich mag ihn seit der Kindheit.

translation.en: He's a really hard personality and character
to understand and get your head around.
He always holds his cards close to his chest
in terms of how he's feeling and who he is.
So, he seemed fine, but then I probably seemed fine,
translation.de: Es schien ihm gut zu gehen, aber bei mir war es wohl

translation.en: you know, for large parts of my life when I haven't been, so…
translation.de: den größten Teil meines Lebens auch so, als es nicht so war…

translation.en: Cav's identity is winning bike races.
It's who he is. It's what gets him out of bed in the morning.
translation.de: Das ist er, dafür steht er morgens auf.

translation.en: What does life look like without it, do you know what I mean?

translation.en: [David] His happy place has always been on his bike, by himself.
translation.de: Glücklich ist er immer alleine auf dem Rad.

translation.en: I rode a scooter beside him every day for ten days. Um…
translation.de: Ich fuhr zehn Tage lang mit dem Scooter neben ihm her.

translation.en: And I refused to speak until he spoke to me first.
translation.de: Ich sprach erst, wenn er das Wort an mich richtete.

translation.en: We'd talk about some eating issues in the past
and some pressures to perform.
What is it that's out of control in his life
translation.de: Was ist bei ihm außer Kontrolle,

translation.en: that he's trying to control with eating?

translation.en: [Peter] He is a perfectionist,
and he likes a certain way of doing things.
translation.de: will er alles auf seine Art tun.

translation.en: A lot of people would be happy with who they are as a person
translation.de: Viele Menschen sind zufrieden mit sich selbst

translation.en: and don't feel the need to prove people wrong, do you know what I mean?
translation.de: und haben nicht das Bedürfnis, jemandem etwas zu beweisen.

translation.en: Where does that come from?
And we stopped at this little field.
translation.de: Wir hielten an einem kleinen Feld.

translation.en: He's like, "Do you know what this is?" I'm like, "No."
translation.de: Er fragte: "Weißt du, was das ist?" "Nein."

translation.de: dass man in der letzten Rechtskurve

[Casper] ♪ Come on, Daddy! ♪

Um… I don't like being wrong,

What are you doing to me?

And then, taking his chance.

speechless.

Daddy, Daddy!

Thirty-four stage wins!
We made history!
[in Italian] We made history!

And I'm done.
I'm done bashing on Mark Cavendish. I promise.
Yeah. Just…

Just the… Oh, the emotion and joy that he got out of that.

translation.en: That's huge. Huge, yeah.
Something that we'd spoken about in the darkest of his times.

translation.en: Yeah.

he's at 34,

This is going to be my last transmission.
I love it. I love this sport.
I'll hand you back to the commentary team. And come on, Mark!

[Mark] There's no number that's enough.
